oai_dc:dc.dc:title: French. A.A. Schaeffer Statement 02
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Statement of Professor A.A. Schaeffer. Re: remarks allegedly made by University of Tennessee Professor Schaeffer at Stough Tabernacle re: double standard for men and women. Handwritten comments by Brown Ayres (University of Tennessee President). Includes reference to [Mrs. L. Crozier French] of the Anti-Vice League. Page 2 of 2.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Universities & colleges; Women; Meetings; Public speaking;
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: A.A. Schaeffer
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
